version_description:
- Fixed the issue of data downloading Failure
- Fixed the error where players are unable to see the normal art assets

-New Hero 'Bihyeongrang’ has arrived in Hasla!
-New Ancient Dungeon to test your team’s skills!
-Hero and Soulbound Weapon Balancing 
-3 New Skins added
-New package items have been added
-2 New Champions to unlock
-UI/UX fixes

- Episode 7 was added
- New Goddess were added
- 6 New Heroes were added
- 4 New Skins were added
- New Package Items were added
- UI / UX fixes

- New System 'Exploration' was added
- 4 New Heroes were added
- 6 New Skins were added
- Balance improvement

- Fixed minor bugs

- Fixed the bug where stage boss doesn't appear
- bug fixes for a better gameplay experience!

- Time to meet the new Champion, Franz!
- 6 New Soulbound Weapons 
- 6 New Skins 
- World Boss 'Manacar' 4th floor has arrived!
- 5~6 Grade Rings
- Tutorial Improvement
- New Shop Items
- Balance Fixes
- UI / UX Improvement

- Several images were displayed incorrectly - fixed.
- When downloading new patch files, previous data were not deleted correctly - fixed.
- Defense and Resist were not applied when wearing Rings - fixed.
- Fruits' effects did not take place immediately - fixed.
- Improved first asset download speed.

-7 of the coolest "THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98" Heroes have arrived for a Limited Time! 
-A Collaboration Ancient Dungeon has been added!
-New Skins are here!
-UX/UI Fixes 
-Balance Fixes

- New EPISODE 7 (HARD)
